item.title: Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters
item.description: Hey, so the whole idea of me posting leetcode solutions is not because I think I can explain better than thousands of others out there. Its just a place where I write down my thoughts and explanations so that I remember different techniques I worked through :) Problem Link: https://leetcode.com/problems/longest-substring-without-repeating-characters/ Statement: Given a string s, find the length of the longest substring without repeating characters. Example: Input: s = "abcabcbb" Output: 3 Explanation: The answer is "abc", with the length 3.
